stories.situation: Process inefficiencies at AB InBev were impacting the bottom line.
stories.task: Identify and execute optimization strategies to capture lost value.
stories.action: Conducted deep-dive data analysis on supply chain logistics and implemented data-driven pivots.

stories.situation: Targeting market expansion for a high-growth initiative.
stories.task: Enable significant revenue growth through strategic operations.
stories.action: Led cross-functional teams and optimized sales/operations funnel.

stories.situation: Starting a venture from 0 with no initial capital.
stories.task: Secure funding and validate the business model.
stories.action: Developed a robust business case and conducted 50+ investor pitches.
